CheckBox.android:text: Any collabaration if you have made for the project ?
Did your project required to brave the consequences of going against thetide - wrong norms of society/ beliefs/ superstitions?
Did your project required to cross real hurdles ( permissions/ resources/ resistance from interest groups)?
Does you project or initiative leads to an entrepreneurial venture?
Is your project appreciated/awarded by Government bodies?
Is your project helped you to get a formal leadership roles\n(In college setup/ any other set up in society/ LEAD)?

TextView.android:text: Explain in 100 words the project details.(Procedure, permission and activities done)?
What has been the most memorable\nexperience of initiative?
What is lacking in your initiative and how you think LEAD can help overcome it?
